div.header: Enrolling K-8 for the 2020-21 School Year!:

section.p: Coastal Preparatory Academy is a K-8 tuition-free public charter school open to all residents of North Carolina. Coastal Prep is a neat place to learn! We have a classical curriculum, flexible seating, authentic learning opportunities, and we offer a curriculum that is aligned to North Carolina state standards. At Coastal Prep we believe in whole-child learning and we value citizenship, teamwork, service-oriented actions, and scholarship.

We are enrolling students for the current school year (2019-2020) and are currently accepting applications for the next school year (2020-2021). We would love for you and your family to stop by our school to learn why our students, teachers, and community love our school!
We’ve made it easy for you to request a tour call, text or click the link below and request a date and time that you can visit our campus!

Coastal Preparatory Academy is dedicated to improving the lives of its students by providing authentic learning experiences in a collaborative, nurturing environment that will build a foundation for students’ success in school, at future work, and in life.
Interested in learning more about Coastal Prep? Please complete the prospective parent interest form or call us at (910) 839-0012 and we will be happy to send you additional information!

div.p: Please note that due to COVID-19 that this public meeting will only be available via Weblink below live. Please follow the instructions below to join.
